metadata.title: CVE-2017-2896 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An exploitable out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in the xls_mergedCells function of libxls 1.4. . A specially crafted XLS file can cause a memory corruption resulting in remote code execution. An attacker can send malicious XLS file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: r-cran-readxl package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.0-2').
